name: skullinhanddemo (re-release)
description:
This is a reversed demo - previously written and released songs recorded in some sort of mixed up rehearsal room fashion. The second run of an edition of 24 cassettes and the precursor to 'eyeless terror'.

Thirty minutes of older songs reworked with sporadic improvisational bits blended throughout. All of it recorded in a chaotic flurry between a garage and a guestroom. Pleasantly rough and wildly unkempt - a sprawl of madness and hastily documented blind emotion.

name: babelfishh&oskar ohlson 'we'd rather not' 10"/ "pinky swear" 12"
description:
babelfishh & oskar ohlson - we'd rather not  

a new 10" record available on white or black vinyl


The ferocious and furry twosome have a new unveiling on 10" vinyl! 
Ten songs and two years in the making - a loopy and utterly maniacal jamboree to carry your spirits to the edge of comprehension. 'We'd rather not' doesn't necessarily pick up where its precursors left off, rather propel general madness into a new bracket of definition. A quirky offering brimmed with babelfishh's fragmented imagery and riddled with oskar's musical peculiarity. Not to mention; the always blustering voice of winterismyname helping the whole journey to fluidly follow along a foggy line of clarity. An endearing inside look at its creators, as well as a platform to exhibit their friendship with those that helped make the project possible. 
The album features guest cameos from filkoe, mildew, univac, the knertz choir, scamper, com.pare, members of knertz's plus and the aforementioned winterismyname 

We say that we'd rather not, but, we really think that you should.




---babelfishh & oskar ohlson - pinky swear LP

aside from two songs and a couple of added yelps and whistles this was recorded in a 3-4 week spert in Mainz Germany in June of 2008

our first record  together is here and it features a lot of good friends! in some way or another it features..
scarlett scamper....audio88..home and beastmaster(of papervehicle)........com...pare.........bleubird......winterismyname....the knertz choir..and univac

we are happy to present pinky swear!
knertz 013
limited to 500 hand tilted and hand numbered LP..s

www.knertz.de

name: goatsgloom 7" EP
description:
this 7" is limited to 125 copies and realeased via divergent series.

FRKSE FISHH YUCK

ALL THINGS BY GOATSGLOOM
MASTERING TOUCH BY JAMESREINDEER

10 plus minutes of maddening hell rap recorded in the dreary pacific northwest. 

we are your fathers - we are the snake man. 667

name: CD's $3-6.67
description:
click the option below to choose which CD you would like

1. babelfishh & edison - the guild we hold close

this is a 6 song e.p. recorded in the depths of a rather ominous winter months is hand packaged nicely in collage form. The modified brown cardboard sleeve is ink stamped and includes a  lyric sheet insert.

this release is decorative stamp 008. 
Nov, 2010

www.decorativestamp.org
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2.babelfishh/filkoe/oskar ohlson

all music and production is by oskar ohlson.
half the songs are babel fishh vocals and the other half is filkoe.
guest vocals here and there by the lovely winterismyname!

nice handsewn packaging!

www.knertz.de

3. babelfishh/ Lewee Regal - split CD
    14 songs with guest production from oskar ohlson, yppah, and aspect mcarthy.

4. babelfishh - cole wurl hustle SOLD OUT

last copies of this chaotic EP recorded in Houston Texas' 2nd ward!

5. babelfishh - the use of of

first official release in 2004, maybe? 
a borderline classic some might say.
